dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Intruder, you dare trespass in my sanctum? Prepare to face the wrath of the ancient dead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek only to harness the dark powers within these ruins. Stand aside and you will be spared.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You seek to claim what does not belong to you. The spirits of these ruins will not be so easily swayed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I command powers beyond your understanding. Allow me passage, and I might consider an alliance.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Alliance with a dark elf necromancer? Ha! Your arrogance will be your downfall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then face my wrath and be obliterated, ancient guardian!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your threats mean nothing to me. Prepare yourself!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You leave me no choice but to destroy you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Your end comes swiftly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I merely wish to coexist. The Shattered Realms can accommodate both our ambitions.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your intentions are clear as day, necromancer. Coexistence is a fool's hope.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then perhaps a truce, for now, to face a greater threat?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A temporary truce? Your deceit is transparent.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall force you to yield, one way or another.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You are only prolonging the inevitable.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You underestimate the power of shadow. Relinquish control or perish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Shadow has no dominion here. You will taste despair.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare for the true power of necromancy!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Come, let's see whose power reigns supreme.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your arrogance blinds you. Farewell, ancient fool.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Coward. Begone before I change my mind.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have come for the secrets of the ancients. Help me and I can reward you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic creature, no reward can sway the undying.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Perhaps power is what you seek? Join me, and together we can rule.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I bow to no power but my own. Let's end this.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A shame. You would have made a useful ally.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Prepare to see the true might of an ancient guardian.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I was offering you a chance, but you prefer destruction.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Indeed. To dust you will return.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your refusal is noted. Face my wrath.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your wrath is nothing but a whisper to the dead.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Die, ancient one!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Let us see who dies today.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your resistance will be your undoing.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Enough talk. Face me!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you are beyond reason. I will find another way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Begone, necromancer. Your presence is a blight.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Consider yourself fortunate. We shall not meet again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: May it be so. Begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your time will come, ancient fool.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: It is you who will face an end before mine.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Show me the way to the heart of these ruins, and your existence will continue undisturbed.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: No one commands the guardian of these ruins. Leave now or face eternal torment.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You have chosen poorly. I will tear these secrets from your cold, dead hands.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You will find no victory here, shadow weaver.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Darkness will consume you.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then come, let it consume us both.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will shatter your bones and claim victory.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You are nothing but dust. Face your doom.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I offer you an escape from this cursed existence.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words mean nothing to an ancient guardian.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then perish.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance seals your fate.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: It seems you yearn for oblivion.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I yearn only to see you fall.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Very well, guardian. I will find another way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Leave while you still can, necromancer.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: This isn't over.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: It is, for now. Leave.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You will regret this.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your threats are empty. Begone.
